content.html: 🎅 Tech Nottingham Secret Santa is back! 🎁 🎄 You have until Tue 29th Nov to sign up. 🤶 ⛄ All the details are at nott.tech/santa22 ❄ 🌟 Come join us in spreading some Christmas cheer! 💝
content.value:
🎅 Tech Nottingham Secret Santa is back! 🎁

🎄 You have until Tue 29th Nov to sign up. 🤶

⛄ All the details are at nott.tech/santa22 ❄

🌟 Come join us in spreading some Christmas cheer! 💝

photo.alt: Hackbot is looking very jolly dressed as Santa and is waving at you while standing next to a small pile of presents with twinkly stars in the background. The image is captioned Tech Nottingham Secret Santa and there's a link to nott.tech/santa22 where you can find more details.
